>
[Unholy Water](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3006)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=579" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=699" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 269 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A malicious deity's malice lies within this vial of water. You activate a vial of _unholy water_ by throwing it as a Strike. It's a simple thrown weapon with a range increment of 20 feet. _Unholy_ water deals 1d6 spirit damage and 1 spirit splash damage. _Unholy water_ can damage only creatures with the holy trait.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
